item.description:
---------X---------X---------X---------X---------X
REGISTER TO ATTEND...!! REGISTER TO ATTEND...!!
---------X---------X---------X---------X---------X

Do you love delicious food and fine dining?
...
We are launching a NEW monthly dining club to check out all the amazing restaurants the greater Boston area has to offer!

Since we are limiting the number of people to keep it small and intimate please REGISTER for this event by 3/26.

This month we will explore Thai food at Khao Sarn (http://www.khaosarnboston.com/) in Coolidge Corner, Brookline.

A great setting to make new friends!! Restaurant is located acroos the street from Coolidge Corner T-stop on Green Line (Cleveland Circle bound).

Registration Fee: $0 for members $5 for non-members.

Registration link: http://www.membership.netip.org/assnfe/ev.asp?ID=156

Signup for membership at: http://na.netip.org/members/joinSee More
item.name: NetSAP's Circle of Friends March Dinner Circle!
